messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Guys? We just got a report that the SM just blew up... How did you fuck this soon?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We personnally dont think Security level green is needed WHEN YOU BLOW UP THE DAMN ENGINE

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

A neighbouring station is throwing rocks at you. (Perhaps they've grown tired of your messages.)

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Uh... So how come the SM blew up?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: This is damage control drone 221 all life pods will self destruct when the arive take the shuttle we cant risk a ling geting here so you will all be scaned before leaving
